name: ChatBot for Telegram
author: QuantumCloud

sections.description:
ChatBot for Telegram

Create a Chat Bot for Telegram with the power of the WPBot. Supports Simple text Responses, conversational forms and more.

ChatBot for Telegram is an Addon for WPBot Free version to create Telegram ChatBots. With this WPBot ChatBot addon you can utilize the installed WPBot on your WordPress site as a hub to respond to user questions and provide eMail, FAQ, Conversational Form support within the Telegram app.

Download WordPress ChatBot WPBot

This ChatBot addon extends the WPBot plugin’s functionality and adds the ability for WPBot to chat with the users on Telegram.

Optionally this Telegram ChatBot uses dialogflow API: https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/

However, user can enable or disable Dialogflow API from Chatbot settings.

Terms of service: https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/docs/terms-trial-edition

The plugin can work well without connecting to DialogFlow utilizing all of the WPBot free version’s features.

//-> Try our FREE ChatBot for WordPress with AI – WPBot. It is an easy to use, Native, No coding required, AI ChatBot to provide Automated Live Chat Support. Use ChatBot to answer user questions and also collect information from the users using conversational forms. It can be also be powered by DialogFlow, Tavily or OpenAI ChatGPT or simply use the built-in features to provide Live support and collect user data. ++ Check out ChatBot for WordPress Demo.

ChatBot for Telegram Support, Bug Fix, Feature Request

  • We welcome your feedback and new feature requests for this chat bot! This is a new plugin and we want to improve this chatbot’s features based on your feedback and suggestions. *

Let us know if you face any problem or need help with this chatbot from the comments section.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin zip file. Extract and upload in your wp-content/plugins folder.
  2. From the wp-admin panel go to plugins and activate “Telegram addon”
  3. You are done.
sections.faq:
How to set up Telegram Bot

First of all you need to have WPBot Telegram Addon installed and activated on your website. Then you need to create a telegram bot. In order to create your own telegram bot you need to have a telegram account and telegram installed on your phone or computer.

There’s a bot for that. Just talk the BotFather and follow a few simple steps. Once you’ve created a bot you will receive your authorization token which we need to add in Bot – Telegram > Telegram Access Token field. That’s it. Now your telegram bot will use the WPBot to respond to user questions.
